T02D3505:154b-1: bi shva m'a t'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3505:154b-3: sna tshogs yum gyi sgrub thabs /
T02D3505:154b-4: sna tshogs yum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3505:154b-5: nyi ma zla ba'i dbus su a'a li k'a li
T02D3505:154b-6: dang bcas chu yi sa bon nyid la chu skyes
T02D3505:154b-7: bsgom // de yis bskyed pa'i lha mo zhal gcig
T02D3505:154b-8: phyag gi chu skyes gnyis pa sku mdog zla ba
T02D3505:154b-9: bsgom // lta bu ste // gdengs ka dkar po
T02D3505:154b-10: la gnas chu skyes dkar po'i phyag dang mi 'jigs
T02D3505:154b-11: pa dang na bza' dkar po mnabs //
T02D3505:154b-12: rgyan rnams dkar po dang ldan zhal ni shin tu
T02D3505:154b-13: 'dzum zhing bsgrub bya'i khyim du rab tu bsrings nas
T02D3505:155a-0: ni // de nas bsgrub bya blangs nas slar yang gtso bo'i dkyil @155a * //
T02D3505:155a-1: 'khor lo ni yang dag rab tu zhugs gyur nas //
T02D3505:155a-2: gtso bo'i bka' yis rab tu thob pa'i slar yang
T02D3505:155a-3: bdud rtsi bum pas spyan ma la sogs rab dgyes
T02D3505:155a-4: pas // bsgrub bya de la khrus mdzad rab mchog
T02D3505:155a-5: nus ma rnam pa bcu po rnams kyis yang dag
T02D3505:155a-6: pas // mchod par byed / gzugs la sogs pa'i
T02D3505:155a-7: lha mo rnams kyis rgyas byed rab mchog stobs bcu
T02D3505:155a-8: la sogs rnams kyis mnyes par byed //
T02D3505:155a-9: 'byung por bshad pas mi 'jigs byed cing rab mchog
T02D3505:155a-10: rnam pa bcu yi khro bo las skyes rnams kyis
T02D3505:155a-11: skyong // kru mo rnams kyis 'o ni yang dag
T02D3505:155a-12: byed cing mi yi bu mo lo ni bcu gnyis
T02D3505:155a-13: skyong // ma pang 'khyud // gtum po rnams kyis
T02D3505:155a-14: srung bar byed cing sa steng mtha' dag rnams su
T02D3505:155a-15: rgyas par bya ba'i don gyi phyir //
T02D3505:155a-16: de bzhin bsgrub bya'i ma lus mchog gi bde ba
T02D3505:155a-17: bya phyir 'di ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par
